Episodes.Title: Home From Rome
Episodes.Plot: Rosa stows away in Bella's shopping trolley, when she goes to Bingle's department store. But disaster strikes when a lift gets stuck, and it's up to the Pontypandy fire service to rescue Bella and her cat...

Episodes.Title: Rich And Famous
Episodes.Plot: Dilys wishes she were rich and famous, so goes off to do some treasure hunting in the attic. But she gets more than she bargained for when she knocks over a candle, setting the roof on fire...

Episodes.Title: Quarry Rescue
Episodes.Plot: While Bella is making pizza's for Trevor to deliver James falls into an old quarry. Then Trevor gets his finger stuck in the brake fluid chamber.

Episodes.Title: Deep Trouble
Episodes.Plot: Sam has been sent to weed Penny's cottage garden. Why has Penny been called out to help?

Episodes.Title: Trevor's Bus Boot Sale
Episodes.Plot: Trevor is holding a 'Bus Boot Sale', but then gets trapped at the old dump while suffering from some fumes. After Norman rescues him Norman then gets a surprise from Trevor.

Episodes.Title: What Goes Up
Episodes.Plot: Trevor gets stuck in a balloon and soon its the fire service to the rescue

Episodes.Title: Steele Under Par
Episodes.Plot: When Steele is given a letter of retirement he decides to go golfing. But then his present gets in trouble in Trevor's shed which catches fire.

Episodes.Title: Disaster For Dinner
Episodes.Plot: A fire drill practice is being held at Bella's Cafe, but first there's trouble at 3 Vale Road when Sam's robot catches fire.
